description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The Xmas Chainsaw Massacre is here.  Following an Arctic virus breakout that turns the entire population of the North Pole rabid, it's up to Santa to do the kindest thing by removing the infected elves, turkeys, and snowmen from his home.  Features multiple game modes and Global High Scores so you can compete against your friends and gamers worldwide to see who is best!
description.short: The Xmas Chainsaw Massacre is here.  Following an Arctic virus breakout that turns the entire population of the North Pole rabid, it's up to Santa to do the kindest thing by removing the infected elves, turkeys, and snowmen from his home.  Features multiple game modes and Global High Scores so you can compete against your friends and gamers worldwide to see who is best!
